forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
